name: Pirates & Thieves
description:
Pirates&Thieves is a Pixel 2D RPG game featuring the lives and struggles of pirates and thieves! although its a pixel game, Our game aspires to be as dynamic and lively as other ever: natural movement of objects, lights, etc. 

as a sole developer, I am very excited about this game and need support from you all :)

your feedback is much appreciated and donations are welcomed
